content: @Michele Mottini Thank you for providing a sandbox server for the connectathon! Iâ€™m wondering how to obtain a patient identifier from the OAuth process. I decoded the access token and there does not seem to be a property with it so that we can call the EoB/Claim endpoints with the /ExplanationOfBenefit?patient={id} parameter.

We use standard SMART: pass the launch/patient scope, you get back the patient ID in the "patient" property of the token response. See http://www.hl7.org/fhir/smart-app-launch/#standalone-launch-sequence
